## DataBinding enum

Indicates how a column's visual config is data-bound

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum DataBinding 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Fixed | <code>&quot;fixed&quot;</code> | No data binding, uses a fixed value |
|  Palette | <code>&quot;palette&quot;</code> | Bound to a palette value, e.g., thematic colors |
|  Scaled | <code>&quot;scaled&quot;</code> | Bound to a variable scale |
